sections.heading: 2018, LB760, retroactive applicability; certification administrator; duties; county board; duties
sections.text: (1) The changes made in sections 77-3102, 77-3103, 77-3104, and 77-3105 by Laws 2018, LB760, shall apply retroactively to July 21, 2016.(2) For any volunteer member of a volunteer department serving a c
